cleaned_text: Acupuncture In Solana Beach, CA An Integrative Health Group Welcome to INNER BALANCE HEALTH GROUP and our new location in Solana Beach, California in San Diego's Coastal North County! At INNER BALANCE HEALTH GROUP we offer a unique blend of Eastern and Western healing arts that are tailored to meet our clients' individual needs. We aim to maximize effective treatment strategies for each person and develop caring relationships. In business for over twenty years, we have remained open during the pandemic and have put extra cleaning protocols in place to ensure the protection and safety of our clients. Chiropractic Ecopsychology Healthy Aging Come experience natural care for:
